member.name: T:FossLock.Settings
member.summary: Provides access to application-wide user defined settings.

member.name: M:FossLock.Settings.GetInstance
member.summary: Gets the instance of this class. Note: Each time this method is called, the same instance is returned. The instance is initialized on the first request through this method.

member.name: M:FossLock.Settings.OnPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Raises the property changed event.
member.param: Property name.

member.name: M:FossLock.Settings.RejectChanges
member.summary: Resets the object’s state to unchanged by rejecting the modifications.

member.name: M:FossLock.Settings.AcceptChanges
member.summary: Resets the object’s state to unchanged by accepting the modifications.

member.name: P:FossLock.Settings.StorageType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the storage used for the application running data. See for additional details.
member.remarks: Changing this property will cause StorageLocation to reset to a default value.

member.name: P:FossLock.Settings.StorageLocation
member.summary: Gets or sets a DbConnectionStringBuilder. This may be set to a provider-specific instance object, but you should never assume that you're going to receive a provider-specific instance back from the GET accessor.

member.name: E:FossLock.Settings.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when property changed.

member.name: P:FossLock.Settings.IsChanged
member.summary: Gets the object's changed status.
member.returns: true if the object’s content has changed since the last call to ; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:FossLock.StorageProviderType
member.summary: Possible storage locations for the fosslock manager's running data.

member.name: F:FossLock.StorageProviderType.SqLite
member.summary: SQLite provider.

member.name: F:FossLock.StorageProviderType.MsSql
member.summary: Microsoft SQL Server provider

member.name: F:FossLock.StorageProviderType.MySql
member.summary: Oracle MySQL provider.

member.name: T:FossLock.Actions
member.summary: A static class that contains application-wide methods.

member.name: M:FossLock.Actions.GetAppDataDirectory
member.summary: Returns a DirectoryInfo object for a directory that can be expressed on a Windows OS as %appdata%\FossLock. If this directory does not exist, it is automatically created by this method.

member.name: M:FossLock.Actions.GetConnection
member.summary: Returns an opened, provider-specific connection string based on valued provided by the class.

member.name: T:FossLock.Core.EntityBase
member.summary: The base class for all major business entities in this application.

member.name: T:FossLock.Core.IEntityDbOperations
member.summary: Specifies the CRUD commands that can be generated for an individual object.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.IEntityDbOperations.GetUpdateCommand(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Gets a provider-specific command to update this object in the database.
member.returns: A command object assigned to the specified connection and enrolled in the specified transation.
member.param: The database connection that will generate the provider-specific command. This argument must be provided.
A reference to the provider-specific transation that this command should be enrolled in. This may be null.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.IEntityDbOperations.GetDeleteCommand(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Gets a provider-specific command that will delete the underlying database record for this object.
member.returns: A command object assigned to the specified connection and enrolled in the specified transation.
member.param: The database connection that will generate the provider-specific command. This argument must be provided.
A reference to the provider-specific transation that this command should be enrolled in. This may be null.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.IEntityDbOperations.GetInsertCommand(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: Gets a provider-specific command that will insert this object into the database.
member.returns: A command object assigned to the specified connection and enrolled in the specified transation.
member.param: The database connection that will generate the provider-specific command. This argument must be provided.
A reference to the provider-specific transation that this command should be enrolled in. This may be null.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.OnPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Raises the property changed event. Calling this method will also cause the ChangeState and IsChanged properties to update.
member.param: Property name.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.AcceptChanges
member.summary: Commits any pending changes to the database, and resets this object's ChangeState to Unchanged.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.RejectChanges
member.summary: Returns this object to the state it was in when it was created, or immediately after the last AcceptChanges() call was made.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.GetUpdateCommand(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: When overridden in a derrived class, returns a provider-specific command that will update this object's data in the underlying database.
member.param: Cn.
Transaction.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.GetDeleteCommand(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: When overridden in a derrived class, returns a provider-specific command that will remove this object's data from the underlying database.
member.param: Cn.
Transaction.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.GetInsertCommand(System.Data.IDbConnection,System.Data.IDbTransaction)
member.summary: When overridden in a derrived class, returns a provider-specific command that will insert this object's data in the underlying database.
member.param: Cn.
Transaction.

member.name: P:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that uniquely identifies this object within the database. When adding new objects, this property does not need to be manually set.
member.remarks: Making a request to the property setter should cause an InvalidOperationException to be thrown in any derrived classes, if their current ChangeState is not set to 'Added'

member.name: P:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.ChangeState
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of the change.

member.name: E:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when property changed.

member.name: P:FossLock.Core.EntityBase.IsChanged
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is changed.
member.value: true if this instance is changed; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:FossLock.CustomerFactory
member.summary: Customer factory.

member.name: M:FossLock.CustomerFactory.GetCustomers
member.summary: Gets the customers.

member.name: M:FossLock.CustomerFactory.GetCustomer(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the customer.
member.param: Customer identifier.

member.name: T:FossLock.Core.Validation
member.summary: A static class that provides some commonly-implemented validation routines.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.Validation.ValidateString(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Validates a provided string meets certain criteria.
member.param: The string that will be validated.
The minimum allowable length for validation to pass.
The maximum allowable length for validation to pass.
When true, null references will pass validation; otherwise, validation will fail.

member.name: T:FossLock.Core.ShallowCaretaker`1
member.summary: A memento-pattern caretaker object that creates a shallow copy of the originator provided in the constructor.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.ShallowCaretaker`1.#ctor(`0)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ShallowCaretaker class and creates a shallow-copy of the provided originator.
member.param: Originator.

member.name: M:FossLock.Core.ShallowCaretaker`1.RestoreState(`0)
member.summary: Restores the state of the provided argument based on this instances Memento.
member.param: The object that will have it's properties restored based on the current Memento.
member.remarks: This doesn't totally agree with the memento pattern, but using reflection this is significantly better.

member.name: P:FossLock.Core.ShallowCaretaker`1.SavedState
member.summary: Gets a reference to the Memento that was saved by the constructor.

member.name: T:FossLock.Product
member.summary: Product.

member.name: M:FossLock.Product.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:FossLock.Product.#ctor(System.Data.IDataReader)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Reader.

member.name: P:FossLock.Product.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that uniquely identifies this object within the database. When adding new objects, this property does not need to be manually set.
member.remarks: Making a request to the property setter should cause an InvalidOperationException to be thrown in any derrived classes, if their current ChangeState is not set to 'Added'

member.name: P:FossLock.Product.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a short amount of text that identifies this instance to users.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 50 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Product.Version
member.summary: Gets or sets a string that identifies the version.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 10 characters and a minimum of 1 character.

member.name: P:FossLock.Product.LockProperties
member.summary: Gets or sets the system-identifier properties that the license is locked to.

member.name: T:FossLock.Customer
member.summary: Represents a Customer entity who may have 0..* Licenses associated with their account.

member.name: M:FossLock.Customer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class in the Added state. On AcceptChanges() this instance will be inserted into the database.

member.name: M:FossLock.Customer.#ctor(System.Data.IDataReader)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. The reader parameter must be positioned on the proper record before being passed to this constructor.
member.param: Reader.

member.name: M:FossLock.Customer.AcceptChanges
member.summary: Commits any pending changes to the database, and resets this object's ChangeState to Unchanged.

member.name: M:FossLock.Customer.RejectChanges
member.summary: Returns this object to the state it was in when it was created, or immediately after the last AcceptChanges() call was made.

member.summary: Gets a provider-specific command to update this object in the database.
member.returns: A command object assigned to the specified connection and enrolled in the specified transation.
member.param: The database connection that will generate the provider-specific command. This argument must be provided.
A reference to the provider-specific transation that this command should be enrolled in. This may be null.

member.summary: Gets a provider-specific command that will delete the underlying database record for this object.
member.returns: A command object assigned to the specified connection and enrolled in the specified transation.
member.param: The database connection that will generate the provider-specific command. This argument must be provided.
A reference to the provider-specific transation that this command should be enrolled in. This may be null.

member.summary: Gets a provider-specific command that will insert this object into the database.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.Id
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that uniquely identifies this object within the database. When adding new objects, this property does not need to be manually set.
member.remarks: Making a request to the property setter should cause an InvalidOperationException to be thrown in any derrived classes, if their current ChangeState is not set to 'Added'

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets a short amount of text that identifies this instance to users.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 50 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.Address1
member.summary: Gets or sets the Address1 property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 50 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.Address2
member.summary: Gets or sets the Address2 property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 50 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.City
member.summary: Gets or sets the City property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 50 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.State
member.summary: Gets or sets the State abbreviation property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 2 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.PostalCode
member.summary: Gets or sets the Postal Code property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 20 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.Phone1
member.summary: Gets or sets the primary phone number property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 25 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.Phone2
member.summary: Gets or sets the secondary phone number property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 25 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.Fax
member.summary: Gets or sets the Fax number property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 25 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.Email
member.summary: Gets or sets the E-mail address property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 90 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.ContactFirstName
member.summary: Gets or sets the Contact First Name property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 50 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: P:FossLock.Customer.ContactLastName
member.summary: Gets or sets the Contact First Name property.
member.remarks: This has a maximum of 50 characters and may not be null, however an empty string is valid.

member.name: T:FossLock.LockProperties
member.summary: Enumeration of possible identifiers that a license can be locked to.

member.name: F:FossLock.LockProperties.None
member.summary: License is not locked to any hardware identifiers.

member.name: F:FossLock.LockProperties.CPU
member.summary: Locks to a CPU-related identifier.

member.name: F:FossLock.LockProperties.Motherboard
member.summary: Locks to a motherboard-related identifier.

member.name: F:FossLock.LockProperties.Harddisk
member.summary: Locks to a harddisk-related identifier.

member.name: F:FossLock.LockProperties.Video
member.summary: Locks to the video identifier.

member.name: F:FossLock.LockProperties.BIOS
member.summary: Locks to the BIOS.

member.name: F:FossLock.LockProperties.MACAddress
member.summary: Locks to a MAC address.

member.name: F:FossLock.LockProperties.UUID
member.summary: Locks to the system UUID number.

member.name: F:FossLock.LicenseStatus.Available
member.summary: The license is currently avaialble for locking to another hardware platform.

member.name: F:FossLock.LicenseStatus.Activated
member.summary: The license has been activated and is currently locked to a specific hardware fingerprint.

member.name: F:FossLock.LicenseStatus.Broken
member.summary: The license is broken and cannot be relicensed.
